name: no-purl ribbed scarf in yonder
notes:
materials
- 4 (8) skeins of purl soho’s [yonder][1], 50% alpaca and 50% highland wool. each skein of this worsted/aran-weight yarn is 140 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 560 (1120) yards required. we used the color blue jeans.
- us 8 (5 mm) [straight][2] or 20- or 24-inch [circular knitting needles][3]

gauge
22 stitches and 18 rows = 4 inches in stitch pattern

sizes
scarf (wrap)

finished dimensions: 8½ inches wide x 70 inches long (16 inches wide x 70 inches long) 

note: we used every last yard for our scarf. to avoid running short, be sure to check your gauge, reuse your swatch yarn, and keep tails short.

designed by purl soho designer, [laura ferguson][4].


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/yonder.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-straight_needles.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-circular_needles.html
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/laura-ferguson-for-purl-soho/
